comments.raw_text:
Build: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20111108 Firefox/10.0a1  http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/rev/81dedcc49ac0

After updating to today's nightly and restoring my session with many tab groups, I opened some tabs including one external link from Colloquy. I later noticed that the tabs were still on the tab bar but I couldn't select them.  They appear in sessionstore.js and in gBrowser.tabs.  See video at URL.

I don't have steps to reproduce.  There were no relevant messages in the error console.  

Opening a new profile with the same sessionstore.js restored the tabs in a working condition.
comments.creator: mozilla+bmo@noorenberghe.ca

After updating to today's nightly and restoring my session with many tab groups, I opened some tabs including one external link from Colloquy. I later noticed that the tabs were still on the tab bar but I couldn't select them.  They appear in sessionstore.js and in gBrowser.tabs.  See video at URL.

I don't have steps to reproduce.  There were no relevant messages in the error console.  

Opening a new profile with the same sessionstore.js restored the tabs in a working condition.
